subject: [Lab 09] Q8: No Repeats
content:
Q8: No Repeats

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q8: No Repeats in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: what is the difference between the Q8 No Repeats and Q4 uniqe ?

follow-ups.feedback: They're nearly identical, but `no-repeats` intends for you to use the `filter- lst` procedure that you created and is only expected to work with numbers. On the other hand, `unique` intends for you to use the `filter` built-in procedure (which should be identical in behavior to `filter-lst`) and is expected to work with any data type

threads.question: I got the "too few arguments to function call" error, but I don't know where exactly is wrong. I used filter-lst function and passed in a lambda function to check if the current number is repeated and also a cdr of lst. Can somebody give me a hint?

follow-ups.feedback: Check every single procedure call in your code and make sure you are passing in the correct arguments
